description:
Murder City is a free online MMORPG.

Do you have what it takes to make it here? You will walk the streets to make your way, or meet your doom. Watch your back and make some friends and who knows, you might even become a small time hoodlum. Can you fight your way to the top? If your will is strong and you are cold blooded you might even get to be a boss. Lead your own gang, take the respect of your rivals and someday you could be the most feared criminal master in all of Murder City.

Murder City has something for everyone. The best RPG to play!

Fight your way to become a millionaire. Live on a Private Island. War your way to the top by joining or owning your own gang. Be a businessman running retail stores. Travel to cities and test your luck at the casino and much, much more.

Make Murder City your home today!
